name: Light (Crankdat Re-Crank) [Mixed]
lyrics:
Written by: San Holo

Even if it makes me blind
I just wanna see the light
Breathe in, leave it all behind
I just wanna see the light

Even if it makes me blind
I just wanna see the light
Breathe in, leave it all behind
I just wanna see the light

1,2,3, go

Even if it makes me blind
I just wanna see the light
Breathe in, leave it all behind
I just wanna see the light

Even if it makes me blind
I just wanna see the light
Breathe in, leave it all behind
I just wanna see the light
